name: Eggs with Tomato
instructions: Warm the olive oil in a medium, non-stick frying pan over medium heat.
Add the onion and cook until soft, about 3 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, crushing them with your hand or the back of a slotted spoon.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until the tomatoes have sweetened, about 20 minutes.
Gently break the eggs into the pan and cover.
Decrease the heat to medium-low and cook until the whites are opaque and the yolks are moderately firm, about 5 minutes.
Serve immediately, seasoned with salt and pepper to taste.
